scripts.build: npm run html:build && npm run js:build && npm run data:build && npm run css:build
scripts.macbuild: npm run html:macbuild && npm run js:macbuild && npm run data:build && npm run css:build
scripts.data:build: mkdir -p dist/resources && cp -rf resources/data resources/img dist/resources/
scripts.js:build: mkdir -p dist/resources && cp -rf resources/js resources/item resources/tidal dist/resources/ && sed -i 's/.php/\//g' dist/resources/js/*.js dist/resources/js/**/*.js
scripts.html:build: for f in *.php; do echo $f && php-cgi -q $f > dist/${f%.php}.html && mkdir -p dist/${f%.php} && cp -f --dereference dist/${f%.php}.html dist/${f%.php}/index.html; done; sed -i 's/.php/\//g' dist/*.html
scripts.js:macbuild: mkdir -p dist/resources && cp -rf resources/js resources/item resources/tidal dist/resources/ && sed -i '' 's/.php/\//g' dist/resources/js/*.js dist/resources/js/**/*.js
scripts.html:macbuild: for f in *.php; do echo $f && php-cgi -q $f > dist/${f%.php}.html && mkdir -p dist/${f%.php} && cp -f dist/${f%.php}.html dist/${f%.php}/index.html; done; sed -i '' 's/.php/\//g' dist/**/*.html; sed -i '' 's/.php/\//g' dist/*.html
scripts.css:build: node-sass -o resources/css/ resources/scss/screen.scss --include-path node_modules/compass-mixins/lib/ --output-style expanded --source-comments && mkdir -p dist/resources && cp -rf resources/css dist/resources/
